channel.title: [pi] New to PI Cant Figure this one attacking player thing
channel.description: I am new to PI source and I cant Find the packet where i attack a player it says i must be wearing at least 4 items. I want to Remove that.

item.title: [pi] New to PI Cant Figure this one attacking player thing
item.dc:creator: @genoarch genoarch
item.description:
@genoarch wrote:

I have done that and i still cant find it, idk if i am missing something but im pretty sure ive checked every java file in the source, and i cannot find it.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] New to PI Cant Figure this one attacking player thing

item.title: [pi] New to PI Cant Figure this one attacking player thing
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

genoarch:

I am new to PI source and I cant Find the packet where i attack a player it says i must be wearing at least 4 items. I want to Remove that.

The logical solution would be to find in the server source where “You must be wearing 4 items”. Then check under which conditions that message is sent. Then you can either remove those conditions, or alter them so that it does what you want.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] New to PI Cant Figure this one attacking player thing
